TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICscHostObject implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost

summary.span: 定义用于 Csc 任务的接口以便进行 IDE 通信。

span.span: Defines an interface for the Csc task to communicate with the IDE.

summary.span: 具体而言，Csc 任务将委托实际编译给 IDE，而不是交付给命令行编译器。

span.span: In particular, the Csc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command-line compilers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口允许 `Csc` 任务将项目编译委托给 IDE，而不是使用命令行编译器。This interface allows the `Csc` task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.
